verbs.description: [ARG0: President Trump] [V: said] [ARG1: his administration is considering a plan to cut foreign aid to countries that do not help stem the flow of immigrants] .
President Trump said his administration [V: is] considering a plan to cut foreign aid to countries that do not help stem the flow of immigrants .
President Trump said [ARG0: his administration] is [V: considering] [ARG1: a plan to cut foreign aid to countries that do not help stem the flow of immigrants] .
President Trump said [ARG0: his] administration is considering a plan to [V: cut] [ARG1: foreign aid to countries that do not help stem the flow of immigrants] .
President Trump said his administration is considering a plan to cut foreign aid to countries that [V: do] not help stem the flow of immigrants .
President Trump said his administration is considering a plan to cut foreign aid to [ARG0: countries] [R-ARG0: that] do [ARGM-NEG: not] [V: help] [ARG1: stem the flow of immigrants] .
President Trump said his administration is considering a plan to cut foreign aid to countries [ARG0: that] do not help [V: stem] [ARG1: the flow of immigrants] .
